text: Guizbangɨra, Sekemɨn nguazimɨn itir mɨghsɨar apɨrazim, a bar nguazir otevir aghuim. Ezɨ kɨ fomɨra uan mɨdorozir sabam ko pimɨn suiragha, Amoria ko mɨsuegha nguazir kam ini. Kɨ nguazir otevir kam, nɨrara danɨngam. Kɨ nɨn aveghbuabar anɨngan kogham.”48:22 Israelia ghua Kenanɨn nguazimɨn itir dughiamɨn, Josepɨn adarazi Sekemɨn nguibam ini. Nɨ Josua 24:32ɨn gan. Ezɨ Hibrun akamɨn, ziar kam, “Sekem,” an ararem akar kam mɨrara ghu, “asɨzir suer akuam tuzir aghuiba an iti.” Nɨ 1 Samuel 9:24ɨn gan. Kamaghɨn, dughiar kam Jekop ghaze, a Sekemɨn nguazim isɨ Josep danɨngam. Guizbangɨra, an akar isɨn zuim gamua ghaze, a nguazir otevir Josep danɨngamim, an aveghbuaba iniamin nguazim gafiragham.
